string.value: #b#p1010100##k in #b#m100000000# seems to be worried about something. Talk to #p1010100#.

#p1010100# says that she wants to make some Blue Mushroom porridge for #p1012101# who is sick but that they are difficult to get because the #o2220100#s have become so violent. You tell her that you will get them for her but #p1010100# says not to because it is so dangerous...
#p1013000# is quite upset that you won't be helping Rina.

Huh? Am I worried about something? Well, the truth is that #p1012101#'s health has been getting worse these days so I want to make her some Blue Mushroom Porridge but it's so difficult to find any #t4000009#s.\r\n#L0##b Are #o2220100#s rare?#l\n#k

No, there are a lot of them at the #m106010100#. But the #o2220100#s have become so violent these days, it's difficult to get Blue Mushroom Caps... I really want to make some Blue Mushroom Porridge for #p1012101#... Sigh...\r\n#L0##bShould I get some #t4000009#s for you?#l\n#k

You?! No way! What are you thinking? You can't handle the #o2220100#s! #o1210102#s and #o2220100#s are totally different. For your own safety, don't even think of going anywhere near them! Okay?\r\n#L0##bBut...#l\n#k
No buts! If I ask #p1040000#, the Security Guard, and he tells me that he's seen you, I'll ask Chief Stan to deny you entrance to #m100000000#! Okay? You promise?
Okay... Don't do anything dangerous. I'll just ask another adventurer who happens to pass this way.
Oh and um... Please don't take this the wrong way but... Why are you walking around with a lizard? A pet? I guess he is kind of cute but...you have a pretty peculiar taste...
Don't even think about it! Don't you dare go there! Never!
Master, she is in trouble! We can help her!\r\n#L0##bNot this time. She says it's dangerous.#l\n#k

If we avoid it just because it's dangerous, how can we call ourselves heroes? We have to do it!\r\n#L0##bWell, you're kind of right, but we made a promise and breaking a promise is wrong. I think a hero would keep his word.#l\n#k
Well, I suppose... Bu...but...\r\n#L0##bNo is no. Besides I don't think we can win against the #o2220100#s.#l\n#k
So if we can beat the #o2220100#s, we can go?
You can't do it so don't even think about going near the #o2220100#s! I'm not kidding! And this isn't one of those quests where you're supposed to do the opposite!
